attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person from outside of the Uk commits a serious offence in this country they should be deported back to their country of origin. This works very well in Australia so why not here in the UK.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
